author: isurues
msg: Supporting hierarchical services with the '/' charactor. Currently '!' charactor is used to indicate the service hierarchy. But the natural and proper way is to use the '/'
character. Therefore used '/' and improved the dispatching logic to support all possible scenarios.
Added service and operation dispatching tests to cover all possilbe scenarios.
